Description:
You arrive at what looks like a research facility, consisting of a big crystal dome surrounded by smaller ones. The purpose of the smaller domes seems to be the study of different biomes undersea, while the big middle dome serves as a control room. 

The place seems abandoned, as debris impedes easy access to the domes, and who knows what dangers you may find inside. 

However, perhaps the scientists left something interesting behind, either in the different biome domes or in the central one.
DescriptionAction: Would you take the risk to explore it?

    "FLRewardText": "You make your way to the main dome through the debris, and what you find there leaves you speechless. \r\n\nGhostly echoes of scientists conduct their research on several exotic artifacts in the middle of the room, ignoring your presence. Each time you blink, the scene seems to reset and a new set of scientists appears. Sometimes even unspeakable horrors appear, but they disappear as quickly as they come. That’s enough to make you decide to leave this place as soon as possible.\r\n\nOnce you are out of the dome, you feel that there is something you don’t remember, but you can’t wrap your head around it, so you continue your journey not knowing what you don’t know.",

    "FLCRewardText": "You make your way to the main dome through the debris, and what you find there leaves you speechless.\r\n\nGhostly echoes of scientists conduct their research on several exotic artifacts in the middle of the room, ignoring your presence. Each time you blink, the scene seems to reset, and unspeakable horrors appear and disappear as quickly as they come. You can hear the silent screams for help from the scientists. You have to leave this place before you lose your mind.\r\n\nYou don’t know what happened here and you can’t think clearly, as the echoes of the scientists’ panicked screams reverberate in your mind.",

    "SSRewardHealthFlat": 0,
    "SSRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "SSRewardText": "The dome that serves as a dock for the submarines appears abandoned, with the only sign of recent activity being the submarine that brought you down here, still docked at the pier. It waits for a land crew that will likely never come to complete its landing maneuver.\n\nYou were on that boat not long ago, but now, you have the chance to inspect and loot it safely, so you decide to give it a try.\n\nYou finish the nautical machine's landing operation and, once inside, discover that its pantries are stocked with rations in good condition.\n\nYou take what you can and leave as quickly as possible.",

    "SSRoll": true,
    "SSRollCard": "None",
    "SSRollMode": "LowerOrEqual",

    "SSCRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "SSCRewardText": "The dome that serves as a dock for the submarines appears abandoned, with the only sign of recent activity being the submarine that brought you down here, still docked at the pier. It waits for a land crew that will likely never come to complete its landing maneuver.\n\nYou were on that boat not long ago, but now, you have the chance to inspect and loot it safely, so you decide to give it a try.\n\nYou finish the nautical machine's landing operation and, once inside, discover that its pantries are stocked with rations in good condition and some shards from the crew cabin.\n\nYou take what you can and leave as quickly as possible.",

    "FLRewardText": "The dome that serves as a dock for the submarines appears abandoned, with the only sign of recent activity being the submarine that brought you down here, still docked at the pier.
